source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, atmospheric scenery shot of a dark, wet city alleyway. The camera remains completely still, capturing the gritty urban environment. There is no movement from any subjects within the frame.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
